channel.title: /Proc on Sakeven's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in /Proc on Sakeven's Blog

item.title: /proc/locks
item.description: /proc 是由 Linux 内核提供的伪文件系统。 其中 /proc/locks 则是保存当前由内核锁定的文件的相关信息。 详解 $ cat /proc/locks 1: POSIX ADVISORY READ 4255 08:01:395841 128 128 2: POSIX ADVISORY READ 4255 08:01:395663 1073741826 1073742335 3: OFDLCK ADVISORY WRITE 4254 08:01:395845 0 0 4: POSIX ADVISORY
